mapper.select: SELECT regDate, s.`name` storename, s.`status` as status, address as address, m.`name` membername FROM store s, `member` m WHERE s.owner_id = m.memberId ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `event` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), dueDate = #{dueDate} status = 'S', body = #{body}, title = #{title}, provider_id = #{provider_id}
